clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 31.44 bpm.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Thyroid gland shows well-defined echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Right ovary shows mildly heterogeneous appearance.
Soft tissue region demonstrates normal without fluid collection.
Breast tissue shows enlarged lesion measuring 31.75 mm.
Gallbladder shows unremarkable, no stones or wall thickening.
